reviewText: Widowed political scientist, Professor Mary Ashley is appointed US ambassador to Romania and travels there with her children. She had been offered the posting before her husband was killed in a road accident but turned it down as he couldn't leave his medical patients.Her assistant at the embassy is arrogant, self confident Mike Slade who leads a campaign of resentment against her with the other embassy staff. This state of affairs ends when Mary asserts herself and proves to them that her appointment was no mistake. A group of dissidents from various countries try to block her plans for peace and even go so far as to try to assassinate Mary and her children. It's an old style Cold War thriller, headed by two very attractive actors, Jaclyn Smith and Robert Wagner and was excellent viewing on a cold, winter's night.
Title: Windmills of the Gods ( Sidney Sheldon's Windmills of the Gods ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg.0 Import - Australia ]

reviewText: This is one of the Great Miniseries that  Television used to do all so well. Jaclyn Smith is outstanding  as a woman selected to  be the Ambassador to Romania.  Robert Wagner is the man selected to  keep her out of trouble and alive.  Little do they know that a giant conspiracy is  attempting to use her to further their own ends.  The movie shows why Jaclyn Smith was the Queen of the Miniseries.

Title: Windmills of the Gods ( Sidney Sheldon's Windmills of the Gods ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg.0 Import - Australia ]

reviewText: This film is a very faithful adaptation of Sidney Sheldon's novel about Mary Ashley, a university professor who's appointed as US ambassador to Romania, only to realize someone wants to kill her. The plot follows the book very closely so there'll be no surprises for viewers who've read the book. And there's not much suspense but it did keep my interest and I wasn't bored by it. Still, there's nothing that sets it apart from hundreds of other similar TV movies. A weak 3 star rating, may have been a stronger 3 star rating if I hadn't read the book.
Title: Windmills of the Gods ( Sidney Sheldon's Windmills of the Gods ) [ NON-USA FORMAT, PAL, Reg.0 Import - Australia ]
